body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! Thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Thomas Powell. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Thomas, my name is Kelly Morris. I'm interested in learning more about your new car models.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kelly. I'd be happy to help with that. Before we proceed, could you please provide your zip code so I can check the availability in your area?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kelly. Now, could I also have your contact number in case we need to reach you with updates or offers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five - one two three - four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. We do have several new models available in your area. I can send you an email with detailed information about each. What email address should I use?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: You can reach me at kelly.morris@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, Kelly. I'll send that over shortly. Is there anything else I can do for you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you so much for your help, Thomas.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kelly. Thank you for your time and for choosing Vincenzo's Benzos. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Thomas Powell and the customer's name is Kelly Morris.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
